price: Uzvišen je Onaj u Čijoj je ruci vlast i On nad svime ima moć,
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱلَّذِي بِيَدِهِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: tabāraka alladhī biyadihi al-mul'ku wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
